name: lingualeap
description: AI-powered language learning platform with hybrid speech recognition

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d postgres redis
scripts.db:admin: docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --profile tools up -d pgladmin redis-commander
scripts.demo:start: concurrently "npm run db:start" "sleep 10 && npm run dev"
scripts.demo:test:
npm run test:local && echo '
